title: Leaver buster, is Broken
body: I'm on my 5th time in a row. literally every time i get to the 5th game or the game right after the penalty my client wont load and I end up getting nailed AGAIN. I cant play like this. I have to give this game up and I'm irate. I have had this account for 6 years and this has never happened before. I'm losing promotionals, then i get grouped up with the most psychotic hateful trolls ever over and over because of my low priority que. I've filed bug reports and nothing is being done. I cant email anyone, I'm going to be losing hundreds of dollars worth of skins if this keeps up and i couldn't be more disappointed. This is unacceptable.

replies.body:
have you considered.... you know, waiting a bit before your fifth?
you can always run into technical issues, before your fifth/(insert #) game, rest a bit, read a book and play, if this is still recurring, try the hextech repair tool.
The Hextech Repair Tool honestly doesn't do much at all.

You dont understand, I do wait between games. I wait hours and days between games because i have to find specific periods to play. I cant just sit down for 45 minutes, now i need an hour and a half guaranteed.
I dont get it. Why? Why not wait a day or to for riot support? I am sure they can help. If youre looking for a reason to quit just quit

Why would i play for 6 years and then look for a reason to quit? This is literally the only game i play. If you arent being helpful why even respond? clearly nothing else is helping and i dont get it either.
